entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
